title: Tree Fern, Jamaica
provenance: Gift of the artist's son, Louis P. Church, in 1917 to the Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration
medium: Brush and oil paint, graphite on cream paperboard
description: A central solitary palm tree stands with fronds fanned out against azure sky obscured by dense rosy clouds. From the foreground to the horizon, inclined verdant hills roll on.
name: Drawing
